recipe.name: Chili Relleno Casserole
recipe.instructions:
Lightly grease 9x13-inch glass baking dish.
Separate eggs. Beat the whites until soft peaks form. Beat the yolks, milk, flour, salt and pepper in a medium bowl to blend. Fold whites into yolk mixture.
Arrange 1/3 of the chilies in the prepared dish, covering bottom completely. Sprinkle with 1/3 of each cheese. Repeat layering twice.
Pour egg mixture over cheese. Optional: let stand 30 minutes. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
Preheat oven to 350°F. Bake until casserole is slightly puffed in center and golden brown on edges, about 45 minutes. Cool 20 minutes and serve.

ingredient.ingredientName: Cans Whole Green Chilies (7-ounces each), or 10 Charred Fresh Poblano* Chilies (see separate recipe for charring instructions)
Shredded Cheddar, (about 1 Pound) – we use Mexican Blend
Shredded Monterey Jack, (about 1 Pound) – we use Pepper Jack
